comment.author: 31067552@N00
comment._content: It would appear that the photographer is not unknown, but rather is one Ch. [Charles?] Reutlinger.

comment.author: 7576993@N07
comment._content:
Hi JustDerek, 

Thank you for taking the time to comment on our photo! You are absolutely correct - the photographer is Charles Reutlinger. It seems that a few of the photographers from this set  were dropped when the photos made their way to Flickr. We will be correcting this photo and several others. Thank you for bringing this to our attention!
